If youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re new to BeagleBone Black, or want to explore more of its capabilities, this cookbook provides scores of recipes for connecting and talking to the physical world with this credit-card-sized computer.

All you need is minimal familiarity with computer programming and electronics. Each recipe includes clear and simple wiring diagrams and example code to get you started. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know what BeagleBone Black is, you might decide to get one after scanning these recipes.
